copilotResumeLastChat.label: Genoptag den sidste chat, når du åbner SidePanel (copilot)

webUIResumeLastChat.label: Genoptag den sidste chat, når du åbner Web UI'en

sendNotificationAfterIndexing.label: Send besked efter færdigbehandling af vidensbasen

sidepanelTemporaryChat.label: Aktivér midlertidig chat i SidePanel som standard

turnOnChatWithWebsite.label: Enable Chat with Website by default (Copilot)

removeReasoningTagFromCopy.label: Remove Reasoning Tag from Copied Text

promptSearchIncludeServer.label: Include server prompts in prompt search

restartOnboarding.label: Genstart onboarding fra begyndelsen
restartOnboarding.confirmMessage: Dette nulstiller din onboarding-status og fører dig tilbage til opsætningsflowet.
restartOnboarding.toastBody: Vi fører dig tilbage til velkomsttrinnet, så du kan gennemgå server-URL og API-nøgle.

maxWebsiteContext.label: Maksimal Indholdsstørrelse for Fuld Kontekst Tilstand

deleteChatHistory.label: System Nulstilling
deleteChatHistory.confirm: Er du sikker på, at du vil udføre en systemnulstilling? Dette vil slette alle data og kan ikke fortrydes.

ttsAutoPlay.label: Automatisk afspilning af stemmerespons efter færdiggørelse

stt.heading: Tale-til-Tekst Indstillinger
stt.usedByChat: These Speech-to-Text defaults are used by the chat dictation button in the Playground and Sidebar.

webuiBtnSidePanel.label: Show Web UI button in Sidebar

deleteChatHistory.label: System Reset
deleteChatHistory.confirm: Are you sure you want to perform a system reset? This will clear all data and cannot be undone.

export.label: Export Chat History, Knowledge Base, and Prompts

import.label: Import Chat History, Knowledge Base, and Prompts

empty.connectTitle: Connect tldw Assistant to your server
empty.connectDescription: Some settings only take effect when your tldw server is reachable. Connect your server to get the full experience.
empty.connectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL and API key.
empty.connectExample2: Use Diagnostics to confirm your server is healthy before trying advanced tools.
empty.title: Tune how tldw Assistant behaves
empty.description: Adjust defaults for the Web UI, sidepanel, speech, search, and data handling from one place.
empty.example1: Choose your default language, theme, and chat resume behavior.
empty.example2: Control whether chats are temporary, how large pastes are handled, and how reasoning is displayed.

confirm.delete: Er du sikker på, at du vil slette denne model?
confirm.repull: Er du sikker på, at du vil hente denne model igen?

notification.pullModelDescription: Henter {{modelName}} model. For flere detaljer, tjek udvidelsesikonet.
notification.someError: Noget gik galt. Venligst prøv igen senere

managePrompts.title: Administrer Prompts

segmented.helpCustom: Create and manage reusable prompts you can insert into chat.
segmented.helpCopilot: View and tweak predefined Copilot prompts provided by your server.

confirm.delete: Er du sikker på, at du vil slette denne prompt? Denne handling kan ikke fortrydes.

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.help: Du kan bruge {key} som variabel i din prompt.
prompt.missingTextPlaceholder: Variablen {text} mangler i prompten. Tilføj venligst dette.

notification.someError: Noget gik galt. Prøv venligst igen senere

managePrompts.workspaceDescription: Reusable prompts are managed from the Prompts workspace. Use the button below to open it.
managePrompts.loadErrorHelp: Check your server connection and refresh to try again.
managePrompts.emptyConnectDescription: To manage reusable prompts, first connect to your tldw server.
managePrompts.emptyConnectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.
managePrompts.emptyConnectExample2: Once connected, create custom prompts you can reuse across chats.
managePrompts.emptyDescription: Create reusable prompts for recurring tasks, workflows, and team conventions.
managePrompts.emptyExample1: Save your favorite system prompt for summaries, explanations, or translations.
managePrompts.emptyExample2: Create quick prompts for common actions like drafting emails or refining notes.
managePrompts.filterHelp: Search matches title and prompt content. Use type and tags to narrow the list.
managePrompts.copilotEmptyDescription: Copilot prompts are predefined templates provided by your tldw server.
managePrompts.copilotEmptyExample1: Check your server version or configuration if you expect Copilot prompts to be available.
managePrompts.copilotEmptyExample2: After updating your server, reload the extension and return to this tab.

url.label: Page Deling URL
url.required: Venligst indstast din Page deling URL!
url.help: Af hensyn til privatliv kan du selv hoste side delingen og angive URL'en her. <anchor>Lær Mere</anchor>.

webshare.heading: Web Deling

confirm.delete: Er du sikker på du vil slette denne deling? Dette kan ikke fortrydes.

webshare.label: Administrer Page Deling
webshare.description: Tilføj eller disable the page share feature

notification.someError: Noget gik galt. Prøv venligst igen senere

globalEnable.label: Aktiver eller deaktiver serverintegration globalt
globalEnable.warning: Ved at deaktivere serverintegration globalt henter tldw Assistant ikke modeller fra serveren. Du kan stadig tilføje udbydere under sektionen <anchor>OpenAI kompatibel API</anchor>.

advanced.label: Avanceret server-URL konfiguration
advanced.help: Hvis du har forbindelsesproblemer med serveren, kan du konfigurere en brugerdefineret oprindelses-URL. For mere information, <anchor>klik her</anchor>.

about.title: Om
about.heading: Om
about.support: Du kan støtte tldw Assistant-projektet ved at donere eller sponsorere via følgende platforme:

healthPage.title: Health Status
healthPage.subtitle: Quick overview of subsystem health endpoints exposed by the server.
healthPage.unableToReachCore: Unable to reach server core health endpoint.
healthPage.configureHint: Please configure a server URL under tldw settings.

tldw.timeoutPresetHint: Balanceret fungerer godt til de fleste opsætninger. Udvidet giver mere luft til langsomme netværk eller langvarige jobs.

loggedIn.title: Logget ind
loggedIn.description: Du er logget ind på tldw_server

connection.failedDetailed: Forbindelse mislykkedes. Kontroller server-URL og API-nøgle.

hints.requestTimeout: Afbryd indledende forespørgsler, hvis der ikke er svar inden for dette tidsrum. Standard: {{seconds}}s.
hints.streamingIdle: Afbryd streaming, hvis der ikke modtages opdateringer inden for dette tidsrum. Standard: {{seconds}}s.

tldw.loadError: Kunne ikke indlæse tldw-serverindstillinger. Kontroller forbindelsen, og prøv igen.

about.title: Om tldw_server-integration
about.description: Denne udvidelse forbinder til din tldw_server-instans og giver adgang til:

points.providers: Flere LLM-udbydere via et samlet API

manageKnowledge.title: Knowledge QA
manageKnowledge.heading: Knowledge QA
manageKnowledge.worldBooksSettingsDescription: World Books are managed from the World Books workspace. Use the button below to open it.
manageKnowledge.dictionariesSettingsDescription: Chat dictionaries are managed from the Chat dictionaries workspace. Use the button below to open it.

model.label: Embedding Model
model.help: Det anbefales stærkt at bruge indlejringsmodeller som `nomic-embed-text`.
model.helpMissing: Previously saved embedding model is no longer available on the server. Please choose another model.

totalFilePerKB.label: Videnbase Standard Fil Upload Grænse
totalFilePerKB.required: Indtast venligst standard fil upload grænsen

noOfRetrievedDocs.label: Antal Hentede Dokumenter
noOfRetrievedDocs.required: Venligst indtast the number of retrieved documents

prompt.label: Konfigurer RAG Prompt
prompt.alert: Konfigurering af systemprompt her er forældet. Venligst brug Administrer Prompts sektionen til, at tilføje eller ændre prompts. Denne sektion vil blive fjernet i fremtidige versioner.
prompt.webSearchPromptError: Venligst indtast a web search prompt
prompt.webSearchFollowUpPromptHelp: Do not remove `{chat_history}` og `{question}` from the prompt.
prompt.webSearchFollowUpPromptError: Indtast venligst din websøgning opfølgende prompt!

onboarding.title: Welcome — Let’s get you connected
onboarding.description: Configure your server and authentication. We’ll verify the connection and RAG health inline.

serverUrl.invalid: Indtast en fuld URL som http://127.0.0.1:8000.
serverUrl.invalidProtocol: Brug http- eller https-URL'er, f.eks. http://127.0.0.1:8000.
serverUrl.label: Server URL
serverUrl.emptyHint: Enter your tldw server URL to enable Next.
serverUrl.ready: We’ll enable Next once we can reach this address.
serverUrl.reachable: Server responded successfully. You can continue.
serverUrl.unreachable: We couldn’t reach this address yet. Double-check the URL or try again.

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.placeholder: Enter your API key (or use the default demo key THIS-IS-A-SECURE-KEY-123-REPLACE-ME for local single-user setups)

connection.label: Connection:
connection.continueAnyway: You can continue and complete setup now. You’ll be able to verify the connection later from Settings.

onboarding.footerHelp: Når du er tilsluttet, kan du til enhver tid vende tilbage til disse indstillinger fra udvidelsesmenuen.

path.heading: Hvordan vil du gerne starte?
path.noServer: Jeg har ikke en server endnu
path.demo: Udforsk bare med en lokal demo
path.noServerTitle: Ingen server endnu? Du kan stadig udforske.
path.noServerBody: tldw_server er en separat, selvhostet app. Du kan følge opsætningsvejledningen nu eller vende tilbage senere og fortsætte i demotilstand.
path.noServerOptionLocal: Kør lokalt med Docker eller Python på din egen maskine.
path.noServerOptionRemote: Udrul tldw_server til en ekstern VPS eller administreret hosting.
path.noServerOptionManaged: Brug en administreret kommerciel tldw_server-løsning, når den er tilgængelig.
path.demoBody: Demotilstand lader dig afprøve chat, noter og medier med eksempeldata. Serverafhængige funktioner som Knowledge-søgning forbliver begrænsede, indtil du forbinder din egen tldw_server.

onboarding.authModeHelp: Single User (API-nøgle) anbefales til personlige eller små team-servere. Multi User (login) er til delte installationer, hvor brugere logger ind med brugernavne eller SSO. Vælg den tilstand, der matcher, hvordan din tldw_server er konfigureret.
onboarding.apiKeyHelp: Find din API-nøgle i tldw_server → Settings → API Keys. Opret en nøgle dér og indsæt den her.
onboarding.authStepAria: Trin 3 af 4 — vælg, hvordan du logger ind
onboarding.confirmStepAria: Trin 4 af 4 — bekræft forbindelsen og gennemgå næste trin

nextSteps.title: Du er klar til at gå i gang
nextSteps.subtitle: Herfra kan du åbne sidepanelet, indlæse en side eller udforske medier og noter.
nextSteps.chatBody: Åbn sidepanelet og stil dit første spørgsmål.
nextSteps.ingestBody: Brug Quick ingest i headeren for at gemme den aktuelle fane på din server.
nextSteps.mediaBody: Gå til Medier og Noter under Indstillinger for at se, hvad der er gemt og kan søges i.

manageCharacters.title: Manage Characters

tags.label: Tags
tags.help: Use tags to group characters by use case (e.g., “writing”, “teaching”).

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this character? This action cannot be undone.

form.description: Define a reusable character you can chat with in the sidebar.

systemPrompt.label: Behavior / instructions
systemPrompt.placeholder: E.g., You are a patient math teacher who explains concepts step by step and checks understanding with short examples.
systemPrompt.help: Explain the character's role, tone, and constraints. For example: "You are a patient math tutor who explains concepts step by step."
systemPrompt.min: Add a short description so the character knows how to respond.

greeting.label: Greeting message (optional)
greeting.placeholder: Hi there! I’m your writing coach. Paste your draft and I’ll help you tighten it up.
greeting.help: Optional first message the character will send when you start a chat.

notification.someError: Something went wrong. Please try again later

loadError.title: Couldn't load characters
loadError.description: Check your connection and try again.

manageCharacters.emptyDescription: Create a reusable character with a name, description, and system prompt you can chat with.
manageCharacters.emptyExample1: Define a writing coach, lore expert, or coding assistant you can reuse across chats.
manageCharacters.emptyExample2: Give each character a clear description and behavior so their responses stay consistent.

systemNotifications.syncSuccess: Firefox-data blev synkroniseret. Du behøver ikke gøre det igen

prompts.privateModeDescription: Firefox privat tilstand understøtter ikke lagring i IndexedDB. Tilføj prompts fra et normalt vindue.

models.privateModeDescription: Firefox privat tilstand understøtter ikke lagring i IndexedDB. Tilføj en brugerdefineret model fra et normalt vindue.

promptStudio.title: Prompt Studio
promptStudio.subtitle: Configure defaults and monitor Prompt Studio health. Connection and auth reuse the main server settings.
promptStudio.defaultsHint: Store default project, model configs, and list page size.
promptStudio.defaultsPlaceholder: Persist defaults using existing settings storage (TBD) for initial project selection, execute/evaluation model presets, and pagination.
promptStudio.unavailable: Prompt Studio isn’t available on the server yet.
promptStudio.unavailableBody: Once enabled, you can monitor queue health and set defaults here.

charactersSettingsDescription: Characters are managed from the Characters workspace. Use the button below to open it.

healthSummary.diagnosticsTooltip: Open detailed diagnostics to troubleshoot or inspect health checks.
healthSummary.footerInfo: These checks summarize the last successful ping to your tldw server and knowledge index.

storage.quotaFriendlyMessage: Too many settings writes in a short period; please wait a few seconds and try again.
storage.writeErrorDescription: We couldn't save your settings. Please try again shortly.

evaluations.title: Evaluations playground
evaluations.subtitle: Define evaluations against your tldw server and inspect recent runs.
evaluations.loadErrorDescription: Check your tldw server connection and API credentials, then try again.
evaluations.emptyList: No evaluations yet. Once you create one, it will appear here.
evaluations.rateLimitsErrorDescription: We could not retrieve evaluation quotas from the server.
evaluations.rateLimitsNoData: Rate limit information is not available for this server.
evaluations.noEvalSelectedRuns: Select an evaluation to see its recent runs.
evaluations.runsEmpty: No runs yet for this evaluation.
evaluations.noRunSelected: Select a run to see details.
evaluations.datasetsEmpty: No datasets yet. Create one to attach to evaluations.
evaluations.datasetCreateSuccessDescription: Your dataset is ready to use in evaluations.
evaluations.datasetCreateErrorDescription: The server rejected this dataset. Check the fields and try again.
evaluations.evalNameValidation: Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
evaluations.evalSpecParseError: Evaluation spec must be valid JSON.
evaluations.inlineDatasetCheckbox: Attach inline dataset instead of referencing dataset_id
evaluations.createErrorDescription: The server rejected this evaluation. Ensure name, type, and spec are valid.
evaluations.deleteConfirmDescription: This will remove the evaluation definition. Runs already created remain in history.
evaluations.noEvalSelectedDetails: Select an evaluation to inspect its spec.
evaluations.runCreateSuccessDescription: Your evaluation run has started. You can monitor it from the server UI.
evaluations.runCreateErrorDescription: The server rejected this run request. Check the model and try again.
evaluations.historyEmpty: Run a query to see recent activity.
evaluations.emptyConnectDescription: To create and run evaluations, first connect to your tldw server.
evaluations.emptyConnectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL and API key.
evaluations.emptyConnectExample2: Once connected, you can define evaluations and inspect metrics here.
evaluations.datasetSamplesEmpty: No samples returned for this page.

evaluationsSettings.title: Evaluations
evaluationsSettings.subtitle: Configure defaults used by the Evaluations playground.
evaluationsSettings.offline: Connect to your tldw server to test Evaluations.
